product_name: Werner Tonga Adjustable Stand Up Paddle
long_description: Offering excellent performance without a premium price tag, the Werner Tonga Adjustable Stand Up Paddle offers the same design features of high-end Werner paddles in a durable fiberglass construction. Suitable for multiple paddlers of different heights, the Werner Tonga Adjustable stand up paddle telescopes to fit 3 size ranges: 70 - 77.5 in, 74 - 81.5 in and 80 - 87.5 in. Progressive midsize rectangular blade fits the widest range of paddlers and takes it easy on your joints with a gentle catch. Warm to the touch, even on cool mornings, a full fiberglass shaft helps keep weight to a minimum; fiberglass laminate blade provides lightweight power. 7deg angle offers great forward stroke while freeing the blade from catching while surfing. Durable, T-shape ABS palm grip fits naturally in your hand, offering you refined control for a variety of paddle strokes.
short_description: Offering excellent performance without a premium price tag, the Werner Tonga Adjustable Stand Up Paddle offers the same design features of high-end Werner paddles in a durable fiberglass construction.
